body.p:
To the Honorable Thos E. Bramlette
Governor of, the commonwealth of Kentucky

Your petitioner Isham T. Ladd of Trimble county Ky would respectfully represent that at the May term of the Trimble Circuit court he was fined the sum of Twenty Dollars for betting on a game of pitching Dollars in the commons of Bedford,

He says he was not aware that it would amount to a fine to bet on the result of such a game, and further the amount bet was a small sum, and that publickly made He says he is not in the habit of betting, and prays your honor to remit Said fine, if consistent with your clemency & will ever pray &c &c
We the undersigned citizens & neighbors of the above petition join him in his prayer &c, &c

W. Stratton
